description.narrative: General question: Results related to the intended outcome 2016Question: Summarise results related to the intended outcome (this information will be sent to Open Aid)Answer: The project continued for three months during 2016 and came to an end in March. One of the main activities of TAF, the secretariat for the Election Working Group (EWG), during 2016 was to facilitate the election of a new steering committee for the EWG. The steering committee, as a governing body, is mandated to oversee the functions of the EWG. The EWG's code of conduct, governing documents and strategy planning have all been updated with respect to the need for enhanced capacity of the network within the challenging operating environment. During 2016, TAF also carried out a nationwide perception survey. The survey provided critical insights into citizens' attitudes towards democratic values, political engagement, elections, political tolerance and the role of gender in the political process. The survey report also provided recommendations on the type of strategies that both domestic and international stakeholders could take to address the challenges in upholding democracy.
No indicator available - only a description of the activity results is published
